Koga Shuko/Sixshot/Unitron/Anubis/Hades/Shockwave:



Koga Shuko watched Sixshot exit the chamber he had been in.

---

Opening his optics, Sixshot looked around, accessing his memory files.  
"W..where am I?"

"You, are onboard my craft.  I, am Koga Shuko.  A creator of yours.  Set, my 
partner, is around here somewhere.  He is also a co-creator. Y-"

"Quite.  I have gotten the information I required.  What are your oders, 
Master Shuko?  Shall we wait for Master Set?"

"Yes.  Unitron, fill him in on the events recently." Shuko ordered, Unitron 
obliging and beginning to explain the small history since the ship had 
crashed.


=====

Shockwave's internal scanners detected a bit of weapons fire not to far from 
his current location.  "It is time to show these emotional Predacons and 
Maximals how a logical Decepticon fights." he said, changing his trajectory 
and heading for the small battle between the Maximals (Stegotron and Co) and 
the Predacons (Mosquitor and Co.).  Sending access power to the engines, he 
blasted off at Mach 3 to the coordinates he had found.
